title: Move
description: Describes a possible piece move to be taken during a player's action

action.description: The associated action number of a move

player.description: String of player making this move (white, black, etc.)

pieceCapture.description: Position of piece getting captured by this move. Null if no piece is captured. Usually the same as destinationPosition, but moves like En Passant break this.

sourcePosition.description: Position of the piece to move

destinationPosition.description: Position for the piece to move to

destinationPiece.description: Used for promotion, reference to the new piece to promote to. Null if no promotion/piece changing is needed.

additionalMoves.description: Array of additional moves to be taken if this move is executed (example: castling)
